sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Alert from './index';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"alert"}}>{`Alert`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A styled alert message`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={'<Alert>lorem</Alert>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Alert}}>
    <Alert>lorem</Alert>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"alert-colours"}}>{`Alert colours`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Use the `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`type`}</MDXTag>{` prop to provide styling to the alert.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={'<Alert>Default</Alert>\n<Alert type=\"brand\">Brand</Alert>\n<Alert type=\"info\">Brand</Alert>\n<Alert type=\"warning\">Warning</Alert>\n<Alert type=\"success\">Success</Alert>\n<Alert type=\"error\">Error</Alert>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Alert}}>
    <Alert>Default</Alert>
    <Alert type="brand">Brand</Alert>
    <Alert type="info">Brand</Alert>
    <Alert type="warning">Warning</Alert>
    <Alert type="success">Success</Alert>
    <Alert type="error">Error</Alert>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"dismissable-alerts"}}>{`Dismissable alerts`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Use the `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`dismissable`}</MDXTag>{` prop to add a close button to the alert. The `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`onDismiss`}</MDXTag>{` prop is a function called when the user clicks it.`}</MDXTag>

    <Alert type="info" dismissable onDismiss={this.onDismiss}>Brand</Alert>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Alert} />
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
